com.vector.cfg.automation.api.project

Interface ICreateProjectGeneralApi


  • @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
 @NotThreadSafe
public interface ICreateProjectGeneralApi
    ICreateProjectGeneralApi provides means for specifying the new project's general settings.
    ICreateProjectGeneralApi provides means for specifying the new project's general settings.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

      • setAuthor

        @PublishedMethod
void setAuthor(@Nonnull
                                 java.lang.String author)
        Using setAuthor(String) the author for the new project can be specified.
        Author
        Using setAuthor(String) the author for the new project can be specified. This is an optional parameter defaulting to the name of the currently logged in user if the parameter is not provided explicitly. The following constraints apply:
        • Constraints#IS_NON_EMPTY_STRING
        Parameters:
        author - the author for the new project

      • setCreateStartMenuEntries

        @PublishedMethod
void setCreateStartMenuEntries(boolean createStartMenuEntries)
        Using setCreateStartMenuEntries(boolean) it can be specified whether or not to create start menu entries for the new project.
        Start Menu Entries
        Using setCreateStartMenuEntries(boolean) it can be specified whether or not to create start menu entries for the new project. This is an optional parameter defaulting to false if the parameter is not provided explicitly.
        Parameters:
        createStartMenuEntries - whether or not to create start menu entries for the new project

      • setDescription

        @PublishedMethod
void setDescription(@Nonnull
                                      java.lang.String description)
        Using setDescription(String) the description for the new project can be specified.
        Description
        Using setDescription(String) the description for the new project can be specified. This is an optional parameter defaulting to "" if the parameter is not provided explicitly. The following constraints apply:
        • Constraints#IS_NOT_NULL
        Parameters:
        description - the description for the new project

      • setVersion

        @PublishedMethod
void setVersion(@Nonnull
                                  java.lang.Object version)
        Using setVersion(Object) the version for the new project can be specified.
        Version
        Using setVersion(Object) the version for the new project can be specified. This is an optional parameter defaulting to "1.0" if the parameter is not provided explicitly. The value given here is converted to IVersion using Converters.TO_VERSION . The following constraints apply:
        • Constraints#IS_NOT_NULL
        Parameters:
        version - the version for the new project

void version(@Nonnull

        Alias for setVersion(Object).
